name: Do Not Speed
description:
Drive everywhere. Jump over everything. Buildings, bridges, tunnels. Drive up high - very high. 50 stories up in the sky.
Bored with racing games? You think you have seen every variation? Give this a try, its free. If you hate it, delete it.

Helicopters, Big Stunts, Massive Jumps, Day, Night. Even a special surprise car from the 80's.

This is not just another boring racing game. Its a game that you could only imagine.

Night driving with lights. Collect money by drifting, jumping, speeding, and stunt driving. Super huge city map with 3 separate sections.

Rain, lighting, huge ramps, highway speed racing, traffic, obstacles all included. All in super high quality 3D graphics.

Overhead camera view so you can see watch your jumps and crashes. Easy controls. Exceptional car driving physics. Realistic crashes, with realistic damage.

If you want something, we'll add it. Please write us and let us know. jellyfishgiant1@gmail.com

Expect more updates in a week. More cars, more trucks, more maps, and more challenges.
